wikibase-after-page-move: Kwimuka kwawe kugomba kuba[$1 kugaragarira muri {{WBREPONAME}} ingingo] ihuza ururimi. Turagusaba ko ugenzura ko ibi byabaye.
wikibase-after-page-delete: Ihuza nuru rupapuro yagombye kuba yarakuwe kubintu bifitanye isano[$1{{WBREPONAME}}]. Turagusaba ko wagenzura ko ibi byabaye.
wikibase-after-page-delete-queued: Ikintu [$1 {{WBREPONAME}}] kijyanye nuru rubuga kizahita kivugururwa. Nyamuneka menyako ibi bidashobora gubita bibaho.
wikibase-comment-remove: Akintu bihuje cyasibye {{WBREPONAME}}. Guhuza ururimi byavanyweho.
wikibase-comment-unlink: Uru rubuga rwatandukanyijwe na ikintu cya{{WBREPONAME}}. Guhuza ururimi byavanyweho.
wikibase-comment-restore: ikintu gihuje na {{WBREPONAME}} cyakuwe mubyasibwe. Guhuza ururimi byagaruwe.
wikibase-linkitem-failure: Ikosa ritazwi ryabaye mugihe wageragezaga guhuza urubuga rwatanzwe.
wikibase-linkitem-failed-modify: Guhuza imbuga ntibyakunze: yananiwe guhuza ibintu bihuye kuri {{WBREPONAME}}.
wikibase-linkitem-selectlink: Hitamo urubuga hamwe n'urupapuro ushaka kujanisha n'uru rupapuro.
wikibase-linkitem-not-loggedin: Ugomba kwinjira muri iyi wiki no mu bubiko bwaya makuru [$1 central data repository] kugirango ukoreshe iyi miterere.
wikibase-linkitem-success-link: Imbuga zahujwe. Ushobora kubona ikintu kirimo amahuza mu[$1 bubiko rusange bukuru].
wikibase-rc-show-wikidata-pref: Erekana impinduka mumahinduka ya vuba ya{{WBREPONAME}}
